## eachUnoccupiedCoordinate() function

Call iteratee for every unoccupied coordinate that is adjacent to an occupied coordinate on a board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function eachUnoccupiedCoordinate(board: GameBoard, iteratee: StackFn): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

iteratee


</td><td>

[StackFn](./hive-lib.stackfn.md)


</td><td>

The function invoked per iteration.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

false if iteration ended early, true otherwise.

## Remarks

Each coordinate will only be visited once. Iteratee functions may exit iteration early by explicitly returning false.
